t: Weakerthans - Watermark - Amazon.com Music
s: Even for an EP this is rather short, but if you're a fan of the Weakerthans (like everyone should be) then this is a must. Watermark is nice, but the true gems are the two live cuts. Weakerthans live is something to be seen; and if you can't see them, then at least you can hear them here.
